EmailTemplate.name: National - Codes
EmailTemplate.subject: *IMPORTANT* DealChicken Redemption Codes Attached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As a reminder, your promotion, {!Opportunity.Name}, is scheduled to launch on {!Opportunity.DC_Run_Date__c} and ends on {!Opportunity.DC_End_Date__c}.
You are almost ready to run on DealChicken. Your next step is to upload the attached Redemption Codes for your deal.
If you have any questions regarding the Redemption Codes, please let me know.
Thank you for partnering with DealChicken, and we are looking forward to launching your business!
My best,
Danielle Gosnell Merchant Loyalty Coordinator Social Commerce dgosnell@gannett.com
